column1: Baby Barnaby's////My wife and I were in town for her birthday weekend. We wanted brunch before leaving back to SA. Long wait
column2: maybe an hour or so. Boy was it worth the wait! They fresh squeeze their orange juice. Must try! Green eggs
column3: must try! Yummm!! We also ordered a banana walnut pancake and it was really good as well. Service was a tad slow but the food and atmosphere kept this place at 5 stars. Highly recommend!
